wxExVi Class Reference

Detailed Description

Offers a class that extends wxExSTC with vi behaviour.

Member Function Documentation

bool wxExVi::ExecCommand ( const wxString &  command  ) 

Executes vi: command that was entered on the vi bar, or present as modeline command inside a file.

Returns true if the command was handled.

bool wxExVi::FindCommand ( const wxString &  command,
const wxString &  text 
)

Executes vi find command that was entered on the vi bar.

The command should be a '/' or a '?'. Returns true if the text was found.

bool wxExVi::OnChar ( const wxKeyEvent &  event  ) 

Handles char events.

Returns true if event is allowed to be skipped. This means that the char is not handled by vi, e.g. vi mode is not active, or we are in insert mode, so the char should be handled by stc.

bool wxExVi::OnKeyDown ( const wxKeyEvent &  event  ) 

Handles keydown events.

See OnChar.
